00127 struct hwloc_obj {
00128   /* physical information */
00129   hwloc_obj_type_t type;                
00130   signed os_index;                      
00131   char *name;                           
00134   union hwloc_obj_attr_u *attr;
00135 
00136   /* global position */
00137   unsigned depth;                       
00138   unsigned logical_index;               
00140   struct hwloc_obj *next_cousin;        
00141   struct hwloc_obj *prev_cousin;        
00143   /* father */
00144   struct hwloc_obj *father;             
00145   unsigned sibling_rank;                
00146   struct hwloc_obj *next_sibling;       
00147   struct hwloc_obj *prev_sibling;       
00149   /* children */
00150   unsigned arity;                       
00151   struct hwloc_obj **children;          
00152   struct hwloc_obj *first_child;        
00153   struct hwloc_obj *last_child;         
00155   /* misc */
00156   void *userdata;                       
00158   /* cpuset */
00159   hwloc_cpuset_t cpuset;                
00161   signed os_level;                      
00162 };
00163 typedef struct hwloc_obj * hwloc_obj_t;
00164 
00166 union hwloc_obj_attr_u {
00168   struct hwloc_cache_attr_s {
00169     unsigned long memory_kB;              
00170     unsigned depth;                       
00171   } cache;
00173   struct hwloc_memory_attr_s {
00174     unsigned long memory_kB;              
00175     unsigned long huge_page_free;         
00176   } node;
00178   struct hwloc_machine_attr_s {
00179     char *dmi_board_vendor;               
00180     char *dmi_board_name;                 
00181     unsigned long memory_kB;              
00182     unsigned long huge_page_free;         
00183     unsigned long huge_page_size_kB;      
00184   } machine;
00186   struct hwloc_machine_attr_s system;
00188   struct hwloc_misc_attr_s {
00189     unsigned depth;                       
00190   } misc;
00191 };

00279 enum hwloc_topology_flags_e {
00280   /* \brief Detect the whole system, ignore reservations that may have been setup by the administrator.
00281    *
00282    * Gather all resources, even if some were disabled by the administrator.
00283    * For instance, ignore Linux Cpusets and gather all processors and memory nodes.
00284    */
00285   HWLOC_TOPOLOGY_FLAG_WHOLE_SYSTEM = (1<<0),
00286 
00287   /* \brief Assume that the selected backend provides the topology for the
00288    * system on which we are running.
00289    *
00290    * This forces is_thissystem to 1, i.e. makes hwloc assume that the selected
00291    * backend provides the topology for the system on which we are running, even
00292    * if it is not the OS-specific backend but the XML backend for instance.
00293    * This means making the binding functions actually call the OS-specific
00294    * system calls and really do binding, while the XML backend would otherwise
00295    * provide empty hooks just returning success.
00296    *
00297    * This can be used for efficiency reasons to first detect the topology once,
00298    * save it to an XML file, and quickly reload it later through the XML
00299    * backend, but still having binding functions actually do bind.
00300    */
00301   HWLOC_TOPOLOGY_FLAG_IS_THISSYSTEM = (1<<1),
00302 };

00372 extern int hwloc_get_type_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type);
00373 #define HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN -1 
00374 #define HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE -2 
00377 extern hwloc_obj_type_t hwloc_get_depth_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth);
00378 
00380 extern unsigned hwloc_get_nbobjs_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth);
00381 
00387 static inline int
00388 hwloc_get_nbobjs_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00389 {
00390         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00391         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00392                 return 0;
00393         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00394                 return -1; /* FIXME: agregate nbobjs from different levels? */
00395         return hwloc_get_nbobjs_by_depth(topology, depth);
00396 }

00405 extern int hwloc_topology_is_thissystem(hwloc_topology_t  restrict topology);

00416 extern hwloc_obj_t hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth, unsigned index);
00417 
00424 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00425 hwloc_get_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type, unsigned index)
00426 {
00427   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00428   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00429     return NULL;
00430   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00431     return NULL;
00432   return hwloc_get_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, index);
00433 }
